about_us.title: General Introduction to Handmade Mandala Aesthetics
about_us.content: Hi, hello everyone... after quite a few promises, I'm back today to heat up this blog on a hot summer day, when everyone is rushing to take free baths to cool off. detail.feature_des: Proudly marked with the year Tiffany & Co. was founded, this iconic collection pays homage to history while showcasing a modern sense with sleek curves and smooth lines.
detail.feature_1: Suitable for parties, gatherings, offices, weddings, proms, festivals, and daily life.
detail.feature_2: This product is a personalized item that you like.
detail.feature_3: It is a romantic style with an elegant appearance.
detail.material_3: Occasion: Party, Daily Wear, Gift, Dating, Club, Festival
detail.care_trick_1: Be careful to avoid abrasion and sudden impact.
detail.care_trick_2: Keep it dry and avoid wearing it when bathing or swimming.
detail.care_trick_3: Store in a box or soft cloth.
detail.note_1: Due to different lighting, the color may vary slightly.
detail.note_2: Please allow 1-2 cm differences due to manual measurement.

footer.address: 4th Floor, HaNoi Group Building 442 Doi Can, Cong Vi Ward, Ba Dinh District, Hanoi
